sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import Mybreadcrumb from "../breadcrumb" import Header from "../header" import productsData from "./productsData" import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; function ProductDetail(prop) { const {productId} = useParams() const thisProduct = productsData.find(prod => prod.id === productId) const Qty = () => { document.getElementById('qty').inputSpinner(); } return (

{thisProduct.name}

( 2 Reviews )
${thisProduct.price}

{thisProduct.d}

{qty}

{thisProduct.name}

Price: ${thisProduct.price}

{thisProduct.description}

) } export default ProductDetail
